You reach out and place your hands on the black orb, while entering a state of deep concentration. You feel your mind escaping from your body, flowing into the black orb. Like stepping out of a portal, you arrive at an obelisk in the northern part of Terel. Something about the obelisk compels you to discover more. Your vision becomes blurry, and you return to your body with a jerk, instinctively removing your hands from the orb.
